post_message: One of the Dallas police officers killed in the sniper attack has been identified as DART Officer Brent Thompson, 43. He is the first Dallas Area Rapid Transit officer to be killed in the line of duty. "Our hearts are broken," DART spokesperson Morgan Lyons said in a statement. "We have received countless expressions of support and sympathy from around the world through the evening. We are grateful for every message."
